bibl.title: Studies on the Derveni Papyrus.
bibl.note: The volume arises from a colloquium held at Princeton University on 17-18 April 1993. - Introduction. - I. Translation. - II. General Essays. - III. Specific Columns. - Pp. 174-185: Maria Serena FUNGHI, Bibliography of the Derveni Papyrus. - Index of Passages in the Derveni Papyrus. Index of Passages in Other Ancient Authors [both compiled by John A. PALMER]. Index of Names and Subjects. Index of Greek Words.
bibl.seg: LAKS André and Glenn W. MOST (Edd.), Studies on the Derveni Papyrus.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1997, 8°, viii-204 pp. ISBN 0-19-815032-6.

The volume arises from a colloquium held at Princeton University on 17-18 April 1993. - Introduction. - I. Translation. - II. General Essays. - III. Specific Columns. - Pp. 174-185: Maria Serena FUNGHI, Bibliography of the Derveni Papyrus. - Index of Passages in the Derveni Papyrus. Index of Passages in Other Ancient Authors [both compiled by John A. PALMER]. Index of Names and Subjects. Index of Greek Words.

C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 112 (1999) p. 280. - E. Hussey, Oxford Studies in Ancient Philosophy 17 (1999) pp. 303-324. - John A. Palmer, CR N.S., 48 (1998) pp. 451-452. - Otta Wenskus, AnzAW 52 (1999) coll. 174-176. - Marek Winiarczyk, Eos 85 (1998) pp. 307-312. - A.M.F.W. Verhoogt, AncPhil 21 (2001) pp. 477-480.
